sidebar.step_0.title: üìú Wakadini Zvako ku-SafetyHelp
sidebar.step_0.description: Ongorora zvishandiso zvedu zvakadzama uye zviwanikwa kuti uwedzere kuchengetedzeka kwehutano hwebasa uye kuchengetedzeka munzvimbo yako yebasa.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ‚ö° Wakamboziva here kuti kushandisa vatengesi vanovimbika uye vane tsika dzakanaka kunogona kuderedza njodzi munzvimbo yebasa nekuchengetedza kuti basa ripedzwe nenguva uye zvichienderana nemazinga epamusoro ekuchengetedzeka?
intro.title: Wakadini Zvako ku-SafetyHelp
intro.description: Ongorora zvishandiso zvedu zvakadzama uye zviwanikwa kuti uwedzere kuchengetedzeka kwehutano hwebasa uye kuchengetedzeka munzvimbo yako yebasa.
welcome.title: Wakadini Zvako ku-SafetyHelp
welcome.description: Puratfomu yako yaunotemba yekuchengetedzeka kwehutano hwebasa (OHS) muSouth Africa. Tinopa zvishandiso zvine otomatiki, zvinoshandiswa ne-AI kuti tive nechokwadi chekuchengetedzeka uye kutevedzera munzvimbo dzebasa, zvikoro, machechi, uye zvemitunhu isina kurongeka. Joinha nharaunda yedu kuti uwane zviwanikwa, mabasa, uye rutsigiro rwakagadzirirwa zvakanyanya zvido zvako.
why_choose.title: Sei Uchifanira Kusarudza SafetyHelp yeKutevedzera OHS?
why_choose.content: SafetyHelp ndiye mubatsiri wako waunotemba pakutevedzera kuchengetedzeka kwehutano hwebasa muSouth Africa. Puratfomu yedu inopa seti yakazara yezvishandiso zvakagadzirirwa kukwanisa kushandira zvido zvakasiyana zvemaindasitiri akaita sekuvaka, kuchera zvicherwa, uye kugadzira zvinhu. Kubva pakugadzira zvinyorwa zvemutemo kusvika pakuongorora njodzi, SafetyHelp inorerutsa zvido zvakaoma zve-OHS nemawizard anonyanya kushandika uye rutsigiro rwepachokwadi kuburikidza nechatbot yedu inoshandiswa ne-AI. Inotsigirwa nemitemo yeSouth Africa uye zvinhu zvakanakisa, tinopa mabhizinesi simba rekugadzira nzvimbo dzebasa dzakachengeteka uku tichivimbisa kutevedzera OHSA ne-COIDA. Joinha zviuru zvenyanzvi dzinovimba ne-SafetyHelp kuchengetedza zvikwata zvavo uye kurerutsa maitiro ekuchengetedzeka.
legal_obligations.client.title: Mabasa eMutengi
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Mutemo weKuvaka 5(1)(a): Gadzirira Kuongorora Njodzi Yekutanga (BRA) inoratidza njodzi dzeprojekti.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Mutemo weKuvaka 5(1)(b): Ipa Ruzivo rweHutano neKuchengetedzeka rwunotsanangura zvido zvakanangana neprojekti.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Mutemo weKuvaka 5(1)(l): Tambira Chirongwa cheHutano neKuchengetedzeka cheKontrakta usati watanga basa.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Mabasa eKontrakta
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Mutemo weKuvaka 7(1)(a): Tumira Chirongwa cheHutano neKuchengetedzeka chakavakirwa paruzivo rwemutengi.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Mutemo weKuvaka 7(1)(b): Chengetedza Faira yeHutano neKuchengetedzeka panzvimbo ine zvinyorwa zvese zvinodiwa.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Mutemo weKuvaka 9: Ita Kuongorora Njodzi neKuongorora Kuchengetedzeka kweNjodzi (HIRAs) zvakanangana nebasa.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Mabasa eNyanzvi yeHutano neKuchengetedzeka
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Mutemo weKuvaka 5(5): Vamiriri (PrCHSA) vanotonga Hutano neKuchengetedzeka vakamirira mutengi, vachivimbisa kutevedzera.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Mutemo weKuvaka 8(5): Vakuru (CHSO) vanobatsira makontrakta mukushandisa uye kuongorora masisitimu eHutano neKuchengetedzeka.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Zviongororo zve-SACPCMP: Unofanirwa kuchengetedza kunyoreswa uye zvido zve-CPD kuchengetedza chimiro chehunyanzvi.

cart.title: Basket Yako

resources.description: Unoda rubatsiro rwenyanzvi here? Fonera nyanzvi dzakatenderwa kuti dzishande nezvido zvako zveprojekti.
resources.jane_doe: Jane Doe, Mumiriri we-SACPCMP (PrCHSA) - Nhamba Yekunyoresa: PR12345 - Kuonana: jane.doe@example.com
resources.john_smith: John Smith, Mukuru we-SACPCMP (CHSO) - Nhamba Yekunyoresa: CHSO67890 - Kuonana: john.smith@example.com
resources.emily_brown: Emily Brown, Mumiriri we-OHS - Kuonana: emily.brown@example.com
footer.newsletter.title: Ramba Uri Munhau
chatbot.response: Ndiri pano kuti ndikubatsire! Kune zano rakagadzirirwa zvako re-OHS, ndapota fonera nyanzvi.
construction.title: Kuchengetedzeka KweHutano muKuvaka
construction.description: Iva nechokwadi chekutevedzera mitemo yekuchengetedzeka kwehutano mukuvaka nekushandisa zvishandiso zve-OHS zve-SafetyHelp. Zviwanikwa zvedu zvinokubatsira kutonga njodzi, kutevedzera zvido zvemutemo, uye kuchengetedza vashandi panzvimbo, zvichienderana nezvakanakisa zvakarondedzerwa mu 'Kuchengetedzeka Kutanga: Zvinhu Zvekutanga zveHurongwa hwe-OHS.'
legal_appointments.title: Kusarudzwa Zviri Pamutemo
legal_appointments.description: Tonga kusarudzwa zviri pamutemo kwehutano hwebasa nekuchengetedzeka sezvinodiwa nemitemo ye-OHS yeSouth Africa. Shandisa organogram kugovera mabasa, zadza ruzivo rwevakasarudzwa, uye gadzira gwaro rakazara rinobatanidza tsamba dzekusarudzwa, zvinyorwa zvekudzidziswa, nezvimwe.
organogram.title: Organogram yeKusarudzwa Zviri Pamutemo kwe-OHS
organogram.form.name: Zita reMunhu Akasarudzwa
legislation.title: Mutemo
legislation.description: Wana raibhurari yakazara yemitemo ye-OHS, zviyero, uye zvichagadziridzwa. Gadzira zvinyorwa zvemutemo zve-OHS, tsvaga mitemo yakatarwa, uye ongorora hukama pakati pemitemo. Shanduro dzakarerutswa dziripo kuti dzitengwe kuti zvinyorwa zvemutemo zvakaoma zvinyatsogoneka kweverenga.
legislation.tools.title: Zvishandiso zveMutemo
legislation.updates.title: Zvichagadziridzwa zveMutemo uye Zvinyorwa zveMutemo
legislation.standards.title: Zviyero zve-OHS
services.title: Mabasa e-SafetyHelp
services.description: Ongorora mhando dzakasiyana dzemabasa ekuchengetedzeka kwehutano hwebasa akagadzirirwa kutsigira nzvimbo dzebasa, zvikoro, machechi, uye zvemitunhu isina kurongeka muSouth Africa yose. Kubva pakubvunzana kusvika pakudzidziswa, SafetyHelp inopa mhinduro dzakagadzirirwa kuti ive nechokwadi chekutevedzera nekuchengetedzeka.
services.consulting.title: Rubatsiro rwe-OHS
services.consulting.description: Wana rubatsiro rwenyanzvi pamusoro pekutevedzera OHS, kutonga njodzi, uye kusarudzwa zviri pamutemo kubva kunyanzvi dzedu dzakatenderwa. Takabatana nemasangano akaita seAnglo Platinum, ABSA, uye Metrorail kuti tipe mhinduro dzakagadzirirwa.
services.training.title: Zvirongwa zveKudzidziswa
services.training.description: Wana zvirongwa zvekudzidziswa zvakazara zvinobatanidza maindasitiri ese, kusanganisira kuvaka, kugadzira zvinhu, uye dzidzo. Sarudza kudzidziswa kwekutanga, makosi akatarwa nezvinzvimbo, nezvimwe, zvose zvichitevedzera mitemo ye-OHS yeSouth Africa.
services.audits.title: Kuongorora uye Kuongorora Mabhuku
services.audits.description: Iva nechokwadi kuti nzvimbo yako yebasa inotevedzera zviyero zve-OHS nemabasa edu ekuongorora uye kuongorora mabhuku. Zvishandiso zvedu zvinokubatsira kuita kuongorora kwakazara, kugadzira mishumo, uye kushandisa matanho ekugadzirisa.
services.risk_management.title: Zvirongwa zveKutonga Njodzi
services.risk_management.description: Gadzira zvirongwa zvekutonga njodzi (RMPs) zvakagadzirirwa zvichibatanidza mitemo yeSouth Africa, mitemo yemakanzuru, uye zviyero zvepasi rose zvakaita se-ISO 45001, zvichivimbisa kuti bhizinesi rako rakagadzirira njodzi dzese.
services.support.title: Rutsigiro uye Zvishandiso zveNharaunda
services.support.description: Joinha nharaunda yedu kuti utaure zviitiko, wane zvinyorwa zvekuongorora kuchengetedzeka kwezvitoro zve-spaza, zvikoro, uye zvitoro zvinotengesa doro, uye kufonera dzimwe nyanzvi dze-OHS kuti uwane rubatsiro nekushandira pamwe.
training.title: Kudzidziswa Kwakazara kweNzvimbo yeBasa
training.description: Ongorora zvirongwa zvedu zvekudzidziswa zvakazara zvenzvimbo yebasa kuti uve nechokwadi chekutevedzera mitemo ye-OHS yeSouth Africa uye kuti usimudzire nharaunda yakachengeteka yebasa. Sarudza kudzidziswa kwezvinhu zvinoshanda, kudzidziswa kwechikwata, kana kushandisa wizard yedu kuti uwane zvirevo zvakagadzirirwa maindasitiri ako, vanotariswa, uye nzvimbo.
training.wizard.start: Ndapota sarudza sarudzo kuti utange maitiro ezvirevo zvekudzidziswa.
training.wizard.step_1.title: Danho 1 kubva pa5: Sarudza Indasitiri Yako
training.wizard.step_1.label: Indasitiri:

training.wizard.step_2.label: Vanhu Vauri Kutarisira (Sarudza Zvese Zvinoshanda):
training.wizard.step_2.error: Ndapota sarudza kanokwana vanhu vauri kutarisira.
training.wizard.step_2.option_emergency_: Chikwata cheChimbichimbi (Vapi veRubatsiro rweKutanga, Vadzimi veMoto)
training.wizard.step_3.title: Danho 3 kubva pa5: Tsanangura Nzvimbo Yako
training.wizard.step_4.title: Danho 4 kubva pa5: Zvimwe Zvinodiwa
training.wizard.step_5.title: Danho 5 kubva pa5: Ongorora Kudzidziswa Kwakakurudzirwa
training.wizard.step_5.description: Zvichienderana neruzivo rwako, hezvino zvirongwa zvekudzidziswa zvakakurudzirwa. Sarudza izvo zvaunoda kuwedzera muBasket yako.
training.cart.title: Basket Yako yeKudzidziswa
training.cart.customization.title: Gadzirisa Zvishandiso zvako zveKudzidziswa
training.cart.customization.first_aider_: Ndapota isa zita remupi werubatsiro rwekutanga.
training.cart.customization.emergency_li: Ndapota isa nhamba yefoni yechimbichimbi inoshanda (semuenzaniso, +27123456789).
training.cart.compiled_by.title: Yakagadzirwa naAni
training.cart.training_type.title: Nzira Yekupa Kudzidziswa
training.cart.training_type.label: Sarudza Nzira Yekupa:
training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: Chiziviso che-SafetyHelp: Zvishandiso zvekudzidziswa zvakapihwa ndezveruzivo chete uye hazvimiriri zano renyanzvi. Kune mhinduro dzakagadzirirwa zvako dze-OHS, ndapota fonera SafetyHelp pa support@safetyhelp.co.za kana kushanyira Peji Yekufonera.
training.checkout.success: Kubhadhara Kwabudirira! Zvishandiso zvako zvekudzidziswa zvakagadzirwa. Dhaunirodha PDF yako pazasi. Kune kudzidziswa paInternet, makodhi ekupinda akatumirwa kwauri ne-email.
training.providers.title: Vapi veKudzidziswa Vakatenderwa
training.providers.description: Unoda kudzidziswa zvakanangana here? Fonera vapi vekudzidziswa vakatenderwa kuti vaite zvido zvako.
training.providers.provider_1: ABC Training Solutions - Yakavimbisika ne-SETA - Yakasarudzika paRubatsiro rweKutanga, Kudzima Moto - Kuonana: info@abctraining.co.za
training.providers.provider_2: SafeSkills Academy - Yakanyoreswa ne-SACPCMP - Yakasarudzika paKuchengetedzeka Kwekuvaka - Kuonana: training@safeskills.co.za
training.providers.provider_3: SafetyHelp Training - Kudzidziswa Kwakazara kwe-OHS - Kuonana: support@safetyhelp.co.za
training.manual.purchase.title: Tenga Bhukwana reKudzidziswa Rakagadzirirwa Iwe
training.manual.purchase.description: Wana bhukwana rekudzidziswa rakazara rakagadzirirwa kambani yako, rinobatanidza zvido zvemutemo, zvirimo zvakagadzirirwa zvichienderana nembiri yako yenjodzi, uye mitengo kubva kuvapi vekudzidziswa vakatenderwa.
training.manual.risk_profile.title: Tsanangura Mbiri Yako yeNjodzi yeBhukwana reKudzidziswa
training.manual.risk_profile.label: Mbiri yeNjodzi:
training.selection_method.title: Sarudza Nzira Yako yeKudzidziswa
training.legal_fact.step_1: Chokwadi cheMutemo: Chikamu 8 cheMutemo we-OHS chinoda kuti vashandirwi vape kudzidziswa kwakagadzirirwa njodzi dzakanangana nenzvimbo yebasa.
training.fun_fact.step_2: Chokwadi Chinonakidza: Wakamboziva here kuti kudzidziswa kwechanguva kunogona kuderedza zviitiko zvenzvimbo yebasa kusvika pa30%?
training.legal_fact.step_3: Chokwadi cheMutemo: Makanzuru emunharaunda anogona kuva nemitemo ye-OHS yakasiyana inokanganisa zvido zvekudzidziswa.
training.fun_fact.step_4: Chokwadi Chinonakidza: Nzvimbo dzebasa dzine njodzi dzakakwirira dzakaita sezvipatara zvekuvaka dzinoda kudzidziswa kwechanguva kuchengetedza zviyero zvekuchengetedzeka.
training.legal_fact.step_5: Chokwadi cheMutemo: Mutemo we-OHS unoda kudzidziswa kwakanangana nemabasa akaita sevamiriri ve-SHE kuti uve nechokwadi chekutevedzera.

legislation.cart.description: RMP yako yagadzirwa! Shandisa kodhi yevhaucha FREERMP2025 kuti udhaunirodhe mahara (vanhu vekutanga 100).
suppliers.title: Rondedzero yeVatengesi ve-OHS
suppliers.description: Wana uye maka vatengesi ve-OHS muSouth Africa. Sefa nenzvimbo, mabasa, uye vakatenderwa. Tumira ongororo kuti ubatsire vamwe kuita sarudzo dzine ruzivo.

suppliers.review_form.title: Tumira Ongororo
community_tools.title: Zvishandiso zveKuchengetedzeka Kwenharaunda
community_tools.description: Taura zviitiko zvekuchengetedzeka kana njodzi munharaunda yako kana munzvimbo yako yebasa, kubva pamakomba kusvika pazvishandiso zvakakanganisika. Shandisa zvishandiso zvedu kuona kuchengetedzeka munzvimbo dzakaita sezvitoro zve-spaza, zvikoro, zvipatara, uye zvitoro zvinotengesa doro.
community_tools.incident_report.title: Taura Zviitiko kana Njodzi
community_tools.incident_report.descript: Tsanangura chiitiko kana njodzi (semuenzaniso, gomba muMain Street, chigaro chakaputsika panzvimbo yenharaunda)...
community_tools.incident_report.user_soc: Zita Rako reSocial Media (Sarudzo, semuenzaniso, @username pa-X):
community_tools.incident_report.provider: Isa foni kana email (ichazadzwa zvoga kana mupi webasa asarudzwa)...
Zita reSocial Media reMupi weBasa (Sarudzo, semuenzaniso, @CityofJoburgZA pa-X):
Isa zita re-X (richazadzwa zvoga kana mupi webasa asarudzwa)...
community_tools.list.title: Zvimwe Zvishandiso zveKuchengetedzeka Kwenharaunda
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.title: Rondedzero yeKuongorora ye-OHS yeZvitoro zve-Spaza
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.descript: Iva nechokwadi kuti chitoro chako che-spaza chitevedzera kuchengetedzeka kwemoto, magetsi, uye zvido zvekuvaka zvichienderana nemitemo yekanzuru uye mutemo we-OHS.
community_tools.list.school.title: Gwara reKuchengetedzeka kweMoto weChikoro
community_tools.list.school.description: Dzidza zvido zvemutemo zvekuchengetedzeka kwemoto muzvikoro, zvinosanganisira zvirongwa zvekutiza nezvishandiso.
community_tools.list.hospital.title: Gwara reKugadzirira Zvinhu Zvechimbichimbi muChipatara
community_tools.list.hospital.descriptio: Iva nechokwadi kuti zvipatara zvakagadzirira zvinhu zvechimbichimbi nezvirongwa zvekutiza zvakakodzera nezvishandiso zvekuchengetedzeka.
community_tools.list.tavern.title: Rondedzero yeKuongorora Kuchengetedzeka kweTavern
community_tools.list.tavern.description: Ongorora kuti zvitoro zvinotengesa doro zvinotevedzera mitemo yekuchengetedzeka kwemoto uye kutonga kwevanhu vakawanda kudzivirira zviitiko.
dashboard.title: Dashboard Yenhengo
dashboard.welcome: Wakadini Zvako, [Zita reMushandisi]! Tonga kutevedzera kwako kwe-OHS, RMPs, ongororo dzevatengesi, uye mishumo yenharaunda pano.

document_categories.description: Sarudza uye gadzira zvinyorwa zvaunoda kune sisitimu yako yekutonga OHS. Sarudza kubva pamitemo, maitiro, zviyero, nezvimwe, zvakagadzirirwa zvido zvesangano rako.
document_categories.policies.title: Mitemo
document_categories.policies.description: Zvirevo zvepamusoro zvevavariro nezvibvumirano, zvakatenderwa nevatariri vepamusoro.

document_categories.registers_logs.descr: Rekodi dzinogara dzichigadziridzwa kuti dziongorore uye dzinyore.
